Civic Tower, nke a na-akpọkwa Civic Center Towers, Civic Towers, bụ ụlọ ọrụ dị okpukpu iri na isii na Lagos (ebe ndị ọzọ na-ekwu okpukpu iri ise). Ọ dị n'ebe dị nso site na Civic Center na Ozumba Mbadiwe Avenue, Victoria Island, Lagos. Emeghere ya na afọ 2015 ma ọ bụ Business Tycoon Uzor Christopher nwe ya.
N'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2018, a na-enwu ọkụ na Civic Towers na Civic Centre na-acha uhie uhie iji mee emume ncheta afọ iri ise nke Special Olympics n'akụkụ ihe ngosi 225 n'ụwa niile.
